column5: i don’t really know how reddit works but i’ve seen other people use the whole throwaway thing so i did it too. i should’ve just created a normal account, i’m sorry. i can’t really focus or think straight. family and friends have been really supportive and i’m so thankful to be alive but other than that i feel nothing. i’m sorry if this post was suspicious or anything, there was a shooting in california at my school and there’s multiple articles on it if you need proof. i’m not some dude in a basement i am a sophomore in high school  who experienced something traumatic but i guess there isn’t really a way to prove it.
